name: Aryt Industries
overview: Aryt Industries, Ltd. operates as a holding company that mainly manages, establishes, and develops companies engaged in various fields in Israel. Its companies engaged in the medical, defense, and technology segments. As of June 27, 2001, the company’s investment portfolio in the military division included Aryt Systems, Ltd.; the technology division comprised Officecore.com, Ltd., Voice Diary, Ltd., Sensotech, Ltd., and Sky Dart, Ltd.; and the medical division included SygMed, Ltd. and ElscinTec, Ltd. The company sells its products throughout the world. The company was incorporated under the laws of Israel in 1979 under the name Ranly Investments Limited
